author: 6fb4eee62d702c106897cbed2f56feea
body:
For those confused: This is a summary live thread (much more slowly updating) and the other one is a quickly updated live thread. This thread is to provide a location for the detailed updates to people who are concerned about the war but are unable to track the fast moving developments (because they are asleep, in different time zone, at work, in university etc).  
  
[Affected individuals or people who know affected individuals can use this resource the mod team is building] (https://www.reddit.com/r/worldnews/wiki/ukrainewar)
